article.title: Shanahan Assigned to Office of the Secretary of Defense

tags.tag: Office of the Secretary of Defense

article.text: Maj. Gen. John N. T. Shanahan, USAF, has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and for assignment as director for defense intelligence (warfighter support), Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Intelligence, Office of the Secretary of Defense, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.Â
